task: Add a title to a document
steps: Open the Microsoft Word document called Document11.docx.
Click on the 'Insert' tab in the ribbon.
In the 'Text' group, click on the 'Text Box' button.
Select the desired text box style for the title.
Click on the location in the document where you want to add the title.
Type the desired title text in the text box.
Format the title text as needed using the options in the 'Home' tab.
Save the document to apply the changes.
